page.title: 15CAPENHURST-LOCAL PEOPLE
page.content: The Rev.Canon J.G.White wears three hats.As Diocesan Director of Education he has responsibility for the 120 Church Schools in his area,visiting them,caring for both staff & children, and working to improve educational standards.As Chairman of the School Governors at Capenhurst he presides over termly meetings & makes decisions about problems arising inbetween them. Lastly,as Parish Priest he visits the sick & officiates at babtisms,weddings confirmations & funerals.To-days diary reflects his busy & varied timetable. 9.00-10.30a.m.Diocesan Education Office(Chester).11.00-12.30.Capenhurst C.E.Primary School.3.00-5.00p.m.The Bishop C.E.Secondary School(Chester) 7.00.Capenhurst Holy Trinity Church- wedding rehearsal.8.00 Talk to parishioner about babtism.He receives great help and support from his wife.
